Package de.fzj.atlascore.knowledgegraph

Class KnowledgeGraphService

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fzj.atlascore.knowledgegraph.KnowledgeGraphService
  • @Service
public class KnowledgeGraphService
extends java.lang.Object
    The KnowledgeGraphService is used for the communication with the external KnowledgeGraph. The communication is REST based and depends on preconfigured graph queries.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllSpecies

        public java.lang.Object getAllSpecies()
        Requests all species from the KnowledgeGraph.
        Returns:
        A list of all species known to the KnowledgeGraph

      • getAllDatasets

        @Cacheable("api-data")
public java.util.ArrayList getAllDatasets​(java.lang.String referencespace,
                                          java.lang.String parcellation,
                                          java.lang.String region)
        Get all datasets from the KnowledgeGraph. The results can be filtered by different parameters.
        Parameters:
        referencespace - Id of a referencespace in the KnowledgeGraph
        parcellation - Id of a parcellation atlas in the KnowledgeGraph
        region - Id of a parcellation region in the KnowledgeGraph
        Returns:
        A JSON formated list of datasets

      • getParcellationDatasets

        public java.util.ArrayList getParcellationDatasets​(java.lang.String parcellation)
        Get a list of all datasets for parcellation atlases. The results can be filtered by the id.
        Parameters:
        parcellation - Id of a parcellation atlas in the KnowledgeGraph
        Returns:
        A JSON formated list of datasets for parcellation atlases

      • getReferencespaceDatasets

        public java.lang.Object getReferencespaceDatasets​(java.lang.String referencespace)
        Get a list of all datasets for referencespaces. The results can be filtered by the id.
        Parameters:
        referencespace - Id of a referencespace in the KnowledgeGraph
        Returns:
        A JSON formated list of datasets for referencespaces

      • getRegionsDatasets

        public java.lang.Object getRegionsDatasets​(java.lang.String region)
        Get a list of all datasets for regions. The results can be filtered by the id.
        Parameters:
        region - Id of a parcellation region in the KnowledgeGraph
        Returns:
        A JSON formated list of datasets for regions
